name: Wercker
description: A Docker-based platform for developing, building and delivering your applications
summary: Wercker is an automation platform and toolchain that helps you speed up your development, build, and deployment workflows.  You can use wercker to build, test and deliver your applications in an automated fashion, so you can focus on what matters most; creating your product!
scenario: When i want to spin up a docker container easily

similar.relationship: a graphical user interface to easily set up docker machines
